data.title: Legislative Update: Assembly Bill 1529 – Modification to Vape Cartridge Labeling Requirements
data.excerpt: Assembly Bill (AB) 1529 was recently signed into law and modifies the labeling requirements for cannabis vaping products.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
